title: (x) Harley Davidson logo - custom (similar to RR Block Gothic) {Metadox}
content:
I need help id'ing both of the typefaces used (or something similar)   
   
Thanks. ![HD](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107175019im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33847.jpg)
author: samiam

comments.content:
I'm pretty sure this logo pre-dates digital type, but for "HARLEY-DAVIDSON", one of the weights of [Red Rooster Block Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107175019/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/block-gothic-rr/), optically compressed a little bit, would come very close.   
   
I bet dollars to donuts that "MOTOR CYCLES" is hand-drawn/custom.   
   
If you just need the logo in eps format, try [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107175019/http:/web.brandsoftheworld.com/?id=112&query_id=4131853&page=1&brand_id=1785). .
